demo_video_script.title: SIH AI Harvesters - Crop Yield Prediction Platform

scenes.title: Introduction
scenes.voiceover: Meet Ramesh, a rice farmer from Kendrapara, Odisha. Like millions of farmers, he struggles with unpredictable crop yields. What if he could predict his harvest before planting?

scenes.title: Solution Introduction
scenes.voiceover: Introducing the AI-Powered Crop Yield Prediction Platform by Team AI Harvesters. Our solution uses artificial intelligence to predict crop yields and provide personalized farming advice in local languages.

scenes.title: Easy Input Process
scenes.voiceover: Ramesh opens the app on his smartphone. The system automatically detects his location in Kendrapara district. He selects rice as his crop and enters basic farm details like area and sowing date.

scenes.title: AI Prediction
scenes.voiceover: Our AI model, trained on weather data, soil properties, and historical yields, processes Ramesh's information. Within seconds, it predicts a yield of 3.4 tons per hectare with 78% confidence.

scenes.title: Personalized Advisory
scenes.voiceover: But we don't stop at predictions. The platform provides actionable advice: delay irrigation for 3 days due to expected rainfall, apply nitrogen fertilizer in split doses, and monitor for pest risks. All recommendations are based on real-time weather forecasts.

scenes.title: Bilingual Support
scenes.voiceover: Understanding that language shouldn't be a barrier, Ramesh switches to Odia with one tap. All recommendations are instantly translated, making the technology accessible to local farmers.

scenes.title: Technical Excellence
scenes.voiceover: Built with cutting-edge technology: FastAPI backend, Next.js frontend, XGBoost machine learning, and real-time weather integration. Our platform is scalable, secure, and ready for deployment across India.

scenes.title: Impact & Results
scenes.voiceover: With 87% prediction accuracy and potential for 10-15% yield improvement, our platform empowers farmers like Ramesh to make data-driven decisions, increase productivity, and secure their livelihoods.

scenes.title: Call to Action
scenes.voiceover: Team AI Harvesters - Transforming agriculture through artificial intelligence. Empowering farmers, one prediction at a time.
scenes.on_screen_text: Team AI Harvesters • Smart India Hackathon 2024
